name: CTET 2020 Exam Prep: Free Tests,  Live Classes
description: Prepare for CTET 2020 Exam with Indias Top Teachers.  This app covers everything that is needed to crack the Central Teacher Eligibility Test, and the State Teacher Eligibility Tests from Videos, Live Classes, Test Series & eBooks/Notes   OliveBoard has been preparing students for all major National & State Level Exams delivering several Toppers & All India Rank #1 in several National Level Exams over the years   This app provides Live Classes, Videos, eBooks & Test Series for CTET 2020.   Test Series:-   1) New Pattern Full Length Mock Test for Paper 1 & 2 2) Special focus on Child Development & Pedagogy 3) All India Standing & Detailed Solutions for all Questions 4) Tests in Hindi & English in latest pattern 5) Covers all sections of the CTET  Live Classes:-   1) Online Coaching Classes taken by Indias Top Faculty 2) Covers Full Syllabus with Day-wise Study Plan 3) Special emphasis on Child Development and Pedagogy section 4) Watch recordings of videos that you missed  Free Exam preparation using eBooks:  1) Multiple eBooks for Child Development & Pedagogy 2) Past Year Question Paper: Solved (CTET 2019, CTET 2018) 3) eBooks on Science Questions 4) eBooks on Environmental Science 5) Social Science eBooks  & many more  Coming Soon: UPTET and State TET courses & Tests.  CTET 2020 Exam pattern will have 150 Questions to be answered in 150 minutes or 2.5 hours.  Sections Covered in Paper 1 & Paper 2 are all included in the tests:  1) English 2) Hindi 3) Maths 4) Environmental Studies 5) Child Development and Pedagogy 6) Mathematics & Science 7) Social Science/Social Studies
